name: 3D Poly Fighters
description:
Knock polygon enemies off floating islands in the sky!

This is the downloadable version of the game. This version has a better frame rate than the browser version but, if you want to just play the game in the browser, you can go here: Browser Version

Currently, the only control scheme available is keyboard and mouse.

Basic Controls:

Press P to pause the game

WASD - Movement
-Spacebar- Jump
F - Target Enemy
Tab - UP
Shift - Crouch/down
E - Grab
Mouse - look around
Right Click - Block / dash
Left Click - Light Attack
Scroll up - Heavy Attack
Scroll Down - Special Attack

You can look in the pause menu for advanced controls
